final_itinerary.name: Historical Manhattan Tour
final_itinerary.description: Explore significant historical landmarks and sites in Manhattan, focusing on events from the early development of New York City through the 20th century. Discover the Revolutionary War period, the immigration boom of the late 19th/early 20th centuries, and important civil rights locations with diverse perspectives on New York's history.

events.name: Revolutionary War Walking Tour
events.description: Guided tour exploring Revolutionary War sites in Manhattan

events.name: Ellis Island Immigration Museum
events.description: Learn about the immigrant experience at Ellis Island

events.name: Tenement Museum
events.description: Explore the history of immigration and migrant experiences in a preserved tenement building

events.name: Harlem Civil Rights Walking Tour
events.description: Guided tour of Harlem highlighting key civil rights locations
events.venue_name: Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture

venues.name: Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture
venues.address: 515 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10037
